This is a terrific new hotel that opened in spring 2018. The location is great for the Times Square / Broadway area. So many theatres, restaurants and attractions are within walking distance.  

Being brand new, the hotel is modern and clean. I would say the room size for this part of town is above average. They offer rooms with two double beds which are actually a reasonable size. The bathroom, counter space and shower were quite roomy. 

The staff was also very friendly and helpful. Altogether, I think this is a great addition to the hotels in this part of town.

title: Enjoyed my stay
text: My family and I stayed for 2 nights and we enjoyed our stay very much. It is a new hotel and is very clean. The staff was very professional and polite. We stayed on the 9th floor and the noise from the street at night was minimal, so we slept well. The location was great and convenient to time square, 5th Avenue, restaurants, and the subway. I would definitely stay there again.  Thanks AC Hotel Manhattan NYC!

title: Excelente atendimento
text:
Antes de viajar tive diversas dúvidas e entrei em contato por e mail com o hotel que foi sempre disponível e pronto a me ajudar e tirar minhas dúvidas.
Na chegada o atendimento na recepção foi o melhor possível, em todos os momentos foram muito prestativos, simpáticos e educados.
A limpeza e arrumação do quarto também foi ótima, sendo realizada diariamente e sempre com todas as reposições necessárias.
No dia do check in meu voo era noturno, foram extremamente simpáticos e cordiais guardando minhas malas em um depósito até a retirada.
Em resumo recomendo esse hotel, pela localização, limpeza, educação e cordialidade dos funcionários que estão sempre sorridentes e prontos a ajudar!

title: Great location and hidden gem
text: I was not aware of this property although I have visited NYC many times and most times I tend to stay at the larger Marriott properties.  However, this boutique gem has now gotten my attention.  Because of my Lifetime Platinum status I got the upgraded city view and it was perfect for the 4-day stay.  I loved my stay here as did my brother in law and his daughter.  We will definitely continue to look at AC properties under the Marriott brand moving forward thanks to the AC Times Square.

title: hôtel neuf et très bien situé
text:
bel hôtel tout neuf. chambre propre,  de taille normale, literie très confortable.
manque de lumière par contre.
emplacement exceptionnel à côté du métro time square ou passent plus lignes , 
accueil agréable
je recommande vivement cet hôtel

title: Midtown Maybe!
text:
I have mixed feelings about my stay. Here are some thoughts:

Pros ...
Location - Great! Between Penn Station and Times Square. Very convenient to several attractions. 
Staff - Very Friendly. 
Price - Average. 

Cons ...
Room - I know it’s NYC, but it was small. Also, poor placement of AC unit caused air blowing on my head all night long. Lastly, if you get an exterior unit make sure you have a high floor or you will hear the street noise all night long.

title: Good job
text:
Hotel sicuramente nuovo..
Ben posizionato, a due passi dal cuore pulsante di luci e schermi di Times square.. 
Molto gentili ed accoglienti .. 
Camera piccola ma ben arredata e sopratutto pulita, personalmente sono rimasto deluso dal fatto che il rooftop non era ancora aperto ma aimé vorrà dire che ci tornerò 😁🤙comunque lo consiglio vivamente!

title: Just Ok
text:
I’ve stayed in 4 different AC hotels, this one being my least favorite.
PROs:
Good location 
Clean
Boqueria Restaurant
Ricardo downstairs

CONs:
Air Conditioning is terrible. It smelled like dirty feet, inconsistent temperature 
Pushy staff trying to sell you their car service
Rooftop bar unfinished and you only know if you attempt to go there
Wasn’t my favorite bed (personal opinion)

title: Great new hotel!
text:
I've never stayed at a hotel this new before and I have to say I thought it would have more glitches than it did!

Management here has a staff they should be proud of!

So I'm a light sleeper and always request a room on a high floor and away from the elevator.  When I checked in the receptionist told me my room was next to the elevator but I could move if it was noisy.  I got off the elevator and I have literally never seen a door this close to the elevator.  I figured I was in for some noise.  I never heard a single thing.  No elevator noise, no people noise.  I was amazed.

A couple of minor glitches that I'm sure can be fixed:
- The water flow.  On hot the pipes were vibrating but otherwise a nice rain shower.
- The window coverings.  I love that one whole wall is glass, but that necessitates shades that were difficult to operate.  I was only there for 2 nights and my hands hurt from yanking on the chains.  

Otherwise, as I said, a great opening!

title: Brand New and Great
text: Stayed in this new hotel and the service from Front Desk, Housekeeping and the Restaurant could not have been better... the restaurant is leased out and in keeping with the AC theme is very European... definitely try the Breakfast Buffet, as there are items on the buffet that you will not get on a typical American Buffet... it isn't an Eggs/Bacon and Sausage in a chafing dish buffet...

title: Overall disappointing
text: We just spent 4 nights at this hotel for my 30th birthday. The location is decent since it is a few blocks from Times Square. However, for $300 a night we were expecting a bit more. The shower was extremely narrow and the water pressure was extremely low. Although the hotel is brand new, the shower was already showing some wear. There was only one very uncomfortable chair to sit in while in the room and the lighting was very dim. The biggest disappointment was that my husband called the hotel in advance to order a bouquet of flowers to be waiting in the room upon check in. When we got there, the flowers were not there. The hotel did leave complimentary cupcakes which was nice. We went down to the front desk to ask about the flowers. They informed us they never received the credit card info from my husband. My husband showed me his phone log and he literally called the hotel 9 separate times the day before arrival to confirm. The hotel confirmed they received everything and the flowers would be waiting when we got there. The next day my husband went down to the front desk to complain to a manager. The front desk said they would look into it and we never heard anything. He was obviously very upset and frustrated with the situation and felt the hotel did not do anything to make it right. Overall, it was a disappointing experience and there are better hotels to stay at for the price.

title: Exelente, se nao fosse pela recepcionista Shanice...
text: Estive no hotel de 04 a 09/05, a negocios e passeio. Nota 10 em acomodações, limpeza, localização, presteza dos funcionários, requinte e bom gosto. Quartos muito confortáveis e de um tamanho que não deixa nada a desejar. Chuveiro, amenidades, toalhas limpas. O único contratempo ocorreu no check-in e foi de tal gravidade, que faço questão de relatar! Fomos atendidos pela recepcionista SHANICE. Nos atendeu de forma pouquíssimo cordial e nos forneceu as chaves do apto 506. Ao entrarmos, verificamos que o quarto não havia sido limpo apos a saída do hospede anterior. Retornamos à recepção, relatamos o ocorrido e a Sra Shanice solicitou que retornássemos em 1h, pois providenciaria a organização do mesmo. Quando retornamos, DUAS horas depois, procurei novamente por ela, que disse que NAO LEMBRAVA da situação (pois "haviam muitas pessoas"), e pediu que aguardássemos 10 minutos, enquanto atendia outros hospedes. Apos VINTE minutos retornei ao balcao. Ela me "sugeriu" que sentasse e aguardasse, pois ainda não havia podido verificar. Eu disse que, então, aguardaria ali, em pe, ate que ela pudesse me dar uma resposta. Pois a Sra SHANICE, embora não estivesse atendendo NINGUEM naquele momento, me ignorou por completo. Seguiu organizando alguns papeis e olhando para o computador. Ocorreu que outra recepcionista, da qual lamentavelmente não gravei o nome, perguntou se poderia me ajudar. Expliquei a situação e esta, em menos de um um minuto, nos forneceu as chaves do quarto, pedindo muitas desculpas pela demora!! E situacao semelhante ocorreu no check-out: aguardavamos para ser atendidos e a primeira funcionaria a ficar disponível foi a tal Sra Shanice. Quando percebeu que eramos nos os próximos da fila, deu um sorriso extremamente irônico e deixou o balcão de atendimento. É lamentável que pessoa com tal postura seja colocada na linha de frente, em contato direto com o publico, sem que tenha o menos traquejo para tal função. TODOS os demais funcionários foram extremamente simpáticos e prestativos! Retornaria, sem duvida, mas não espero ter que passar novamente por tal constrangimento.

title: Opening Day!
text: By luck I happened upon AC when I was searching Marriott in NYC!  The staff were very helpful and welcoming!!!  It was their opening day and we were some of their first customers! The hotel is very clean, has very nice rooms with a “Zen” feel, and the breakfast is excellent! This hotel is near Bryant Park, Broadway, & Macy’s.  We were able to easily walk to dinner (44th) and theatre (46th). The staff assisted me in hiring a car service to get to JFK in 50 minutes in morning traffic!  I am planning to return to NYC and I will definitely stay at AC!!!!

title: Don’t stay until construction is finished
text: We came to stay for a conference. The hotel is "centrally located" (next to port authority, AKA homeless city) and "brand new" (AKA not finished). One of 3 elevators was shut down the whole time to finish the rooftop bar which PS was not open (not listed on the website). While our 17th floor city view room did in fact live up to expectations if a little small, let them finish the construction and work out the kinks, then give it a try in a few months

title: NYC HOTEL TIMES SQUARE
text:
We were in town for a “girls trip” to see the sites and attend a broadway show “Kinky Boots” while David Cook and Waybe Brady who were acting.  Our main goal was to find a nice hotel at an affordable price that was centrally located in the Times Square area.

Upon my searches, we stumbled upon and almost missed this fine hotel which didn’t appear in my earlier searches because it was still being built.

All I can say is this hotel was WONDERFUL!  It literally just opened 2 weeks prior to our arrival.
 
Staff was courteous, answered our
questions, provided us with extra
water, bathrobes, etc.   Our room
was always clean, and the
hotel was a great price especially 
for our location which was central 
to everything and within walking distance to Broadway, Shopping, and many fine restaurants.
 
I would highly recommend this hotel 
to everyone for their NYC visit!

Sandy S. 😎

title: La posizione!
text: Ottima accoglienza parlano anche italiano. Piacevole la grande hall molto curata. Da migliorare il servizio ai piani per la pulizia dei corridoi più frequente e dettagli nelle stanze ( nelle nostre due mancava la caraffa nella macchina del caffè). Bella la stanza sulla strada, molto luminosa, un po’ meno quella verso il retro.

title: No Nonsense and sensible option for Times Square
text:
Pros: Great location, clean rooms, modern/contemporary interior design.  Comfortable bed. Very nice and accommodating staff. Rain shower and hand held shower accessories. Great city views from high floor rooms.
Cons: 3 elevators with 1 broken, so the wait was longer than usual.  The onsite restaurant staff was not on par with the hotel staff - probably different management. No executive lounge - but that is reflected in the amenities of this type of offering from Marriott.

title: una buena opcion en Times square
text:
Nos hemos aojado 6 noches en este hotel, la habitación tiene el tamaño que la mayoria de habitaciones en NY, las camas y almohadas suepr comodas, la ducha muy nueva y el baño bonito pero la presion del agua de ducha era un poco escasa. La habitacion cuenta con agua, cafetera, y un fantastico secador de pelo que no es facil encontrar en los hoteles, la pega es que no hay casi sitio para la ropa, eramos dos adultos y dos niñas. La ubicación del hotel es perfecta, super cerca de todo, de Bryant Park y la biblioteca, de times Square, de la quinta avenida, del Empire, nosotros lo podiamos ver desde la ventana de la habitacion!
Como pega pondre que la limpieza de la habitación no era muy buena, casi todos los dias estaban las mismas pelusas en los mismos sitios, tanto en el baño como en la habitación.
El personal muy amable y servicial.
Sin duda alguna es una opción muy buena para descubrir NY, nosotros todo lo hemos hecho andando menos la zona de downtown y Boocklyn.

title: Hotel novo
text: Fiquei 3 noites no início de maio. O hotel foi recém construído, não está 100% pronto, ainda há equipes trabalhando em alguns andares, e a fachada ainda tem andaimes. É um hotel com decoração super moderna, mas de serviços simples e práticos. O quarto é pequeno, mas muito bem aproveitado, piso de madeira, muito mais higiênico e antialérgico. A limpeza pode melhorar, ainda há poeira da obra. Achei o ar condicionado barulhento para um hotel tão moderno. Banheiro simples, cheirando a novo, toalhas novíssimas, chuveiro com pressão fraca, uma decepção, provavelmente para atingir metas econômicas e ambientais. Sua localização é fantástica, perto de metrô, restaurantes, times Square e etc. O café da manhã é servido no sofisticado restaurante espanhol, caro e exótico, esqueça e aproveite as dezenas de opções de café da manhã ao lado do hotel. A equipe é excelente, com muita simpatia e todos os serviços executados rapidamente. Os quartos de número ímpar são no fundo do hotel, tem menos barulho de trânsito, mas se abrir a janela há um zumbido constante, parece ser um gerador ou motor de ar condicionado de grande porte. Vale muito a pena pela localização, por ser um hotel novo, coisa rara em NY e a equipe que se esforça para prestar um excelente atendimento. Wi-Fi gratuito de alta velocidade. A academia fica no subsolo, é bem moderna. Receberam encomendas da Amazon antes da minha chegada, sem problema ou cobrança de taxa.

title: Beyond Excellent!!!
text: Clean hotel, Safe location, Great location, Close Subway access, Plenty of places to eat, Close to so many attractions.  My son and I came for a wedding and had the best time.  The hotel staff was beyond AMAZING.  Everyone was so helpful and so friendly.  We were there one week after opening.  We enjoyed ourselves immensely.  Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again without hesitation.

title: The staff was amazing
text: The staff went out of their way to accomodate us.  We were a group of approximately 40 and upon our arrival at 7 am most of the rooms were ready and we were able to check in.  Close to everything. We were able to walk to all the important attractions.

title: Perfect hotel
text: The location was great, close to everything but not in the craziness. Hotel staff were warm and friendly. Love the modern rooms with hard surfaces and floors. The bathroom was relatively roomy. Only complaint was a few extra outlets and lightening by the door mirror would have been nice. The hydration station water on the fourth floor was cloudy. The hotel was perfect otherwise. We will stay again!!!

title: Minimalistic Hotel Trying to be hip
text: The only reason  I gave as many as 2 stars is because the staff is excellent, going out of their way to be helpful. The room was small and not for a stay of more than a day or two as there is little room to put your clothes. The refrigerator made weird noises, just a bit annoying. The bed was reasonably comfortable but not the pillows and the comforter was this bulky fluffy thing that sounded like plastic when I moved. I ended up just using the sheet. They did not even provide a clock. There are many hotels in this area, I would not recommend this one.

title: Excellent
text: Modern hotel, clean, friendly staff, good location   Everything you expect in a hotel. Multiple places to eat close by and taxis readily available   I’m not sure what else to add. I’d stay here again without reservation

title: Great Place to Stay In NYC With Outstanding Service
text: We stayed here with the hotel just being open 2 weeks.  It was outstanding!  Everyone at the front desk was incredibly friendly and helpful especially Angel.  He went above and beyond helping us out with a late checkout, advice and service.  The facility is a great location close to Times Square but without the noise. The rooms were immaculate and super comfortable and the noise insullation in the walls and windows was great.  Good night sleep and super quiet even though the hotel was sold out.

title: Good service, a little noisy and weak water pressure
text:
I stayed after the hotel was open for about a week.  The hotel has a great location on 40th and 8th, easy to Port Authority subway stop (A and E trains). The service was excellent, friendly staff all around the lobby.   The rooms are modern, comfortable bed, large tv, and decent wifi.  My two issues with physical plant are corridor noise and shower water pressure. The rooms feature faux wood floors, however, they do not absorb noise very well.   When guest room doors close up and down the room corridor, you can hear every one of them close.  They are quite loud.   Water pressure in the shower was very weak as well.  

I like the AC concept and those who are loyal Courtyard customers will likely prefer the decor better.   If ownership can work out the corridor noise and increase water pressure (i.e. take out the low flow restrictors out of the shower heads), they will have a winner.

title: Oustanding Service
text: We stayed at this lovely, brand new hotel about a week ago, with our two daughters. Can't say enough about the friendly service and beautiful new, centrally located hotel. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and special. The rooms were spotless with comfortable beds. They provided excellent recommendations for the surrounding area. We will absolutely be back!

title: Excellente adresse
text: Je recommande vivement cet hôtel pour plusieurs raisons : positionnement central, personnel très dévoué,  petits déjeuners excellents avec un grand choix et une cuisine très fine, baie vitrée sur New York dans la chambre, machine à café nespresso à l’accueil... On s’y sent super bien !

title: 5 Star Service
text: Hotel had only been open for about a week but they were hitting on all cylinders from the moment we stepped in until we left three days later. Everyone at the front desk made us feel welcome each time we passed by. When we departed I had a question about airport transportation since our party was going in different directions and the bell staff checked different transfer rates and even checked the rail schedule from Penn Station. As far as the facility itself, it's a great location only a couple blocks from Times Square but without the noise. The room size is pretty standard for NYC. I must say that the bed, pillows and bedding was awesome!

title: A gem in the city
text: We try to visit NYC a couple of times a year and this time we discovered this newly opened gem.  Cannot say enough about how great the entire experience was.  From the moment you enter the staff is welcoming and extremely helpful, after a few days they seemed to anticipate our needs before we ask. The whole of the hotel was absolutely amazing.  Close to theaters, great jazz,favorite restaurant , garment district, museums, everything we go to NYC for.  Thanks to Benny,Alon, Svetlana, Ricardo,Lynn,and all the others for making this a great stay.  We will definitely stay there again.

title: Glistening clean and new
text: Just opened six days or so prior to my arrival.  Staff was over the top helpful from cleaning crew to front desk.  Five minute walk to Bryant Park Whole Foods, Long Island Railroad Penn Station, multiple subway stations.  I've stayed in AC brand in Portland, and the property is much alike - clean lines, hardwood floors, european breakfast style, no lounge but in my case a $10.00 voucher (Platinum Marriott).  My room was normal size (i.e. small) for NYC, but felt quite adequate.  Was on 18th floor and unique floor to ceiling windows angled inward about 25 degrees with automatic sheers and blackout blinds.  I'll stay here again for sure.

title: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL & GREAT STAFF!!!
text: This hotel is absolutely beautiful, brand new, and in a great location. Aside from the property being absolutely amazing, what sets this hotel apart from the rest, is the AMAZING STAFF! They greet you every single time you walk through the door, they are very helpful with bags, and they're quick with getting you checked into your room. A special thanks to Nykia, Alexis, Svetlana, Benny, Alan, and Jeff for making my stay so great! I will definitely be staying here again.

title: Great new hotel!
text: I happened to book the AC Times Square this weekend, just days after it opened.  Great staff, everyone was so helpful and nice, spacious rooms with an awesome shower.  Love the location in Times Square but not right in the middle of the crowds.
